text: Zyper | Multiple roles | New York City (NYC) | ONSITE | Zyper enables brands to identify their top 1% of fans and turn them into an active community of brand advocates. Our vision is to build a new type of labour market characterised by personal brands and to decentralise advertising. Zyper's technology uses a combination of natural language processing and computer vision to identify peer to peer influence networks. Please view open roles and apply here: https://angel.co/zyper/recruiting/listings
